snippet: The body of Sang Ho Kim, 63, was discovered in the Hudson River, just south of the Bear Mountain Bridge.
abstract: Body of Sang Ho Kim is discovered in Hudson River south of Bear Mountain Bridge; authorities say that Kim shot two people at Savenergy company in East Garden City, LI, his former workplace, killing his former boss; manhunt for Kim involved over 100 law enforcement agents and forced the closing of schools across Putnam County.
lead_paragraph: The body of Sang Ho Kim, 63, was discovered in the Hudson River, just south of the Bear Mountain Bridge.

headline.main: Body of Suspect in L.I. Shootings Is Discovered in the Hudson River
headline.print_headline: Body of Suspect in L.I. Shootings Is Discovered in the Hudson River
